Package imr.media.midi

The midi package provides classes to manage MIDI data and wrappers to javax.sound.midi classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MetaMessageWrapper
    The wrap method of the MetaMessageWrapper class takes a imr.media.midi.MIDIMetaEvent as parameter and returns a javax.sound.midi.MetaMessage object
    MIDIEvent
    A MIDIEvent has a MIDIMessage and a time stamp expressed in ticks.
    MidiEventWrapper
    The wrap method of the MidiEventWrapper class takes a imr.media.midi.MIDIEventobject as parameter and returns a javax.sound.midi.MidiEvent object
    MIDIFile
    The MIDIFile abstract class provides methods to init an run a r/w process.
    MIDIFileReader
    A MIDIFileReader parses a MIDI file and stores the result into a MIDISong object.
    MIDIFileWriter
    A MIDIFileWriter object writes a MIDI file according to the data stored in a MIDISong object.
    MIDIMessage
    A MIDIMessage has 3 bytes as much: status data1 data2 The status byte encapsulates the type of message and the channel to be sent.
    MIDIMetaEvent
    A MIDIMetaEvent extends MIDIEvent So it has, a MIDIMessage and a time stamp in ticks.
    MIDIPlayer
    The MIDIPlayer class provides functionality to play MIDI files.
    MIDISong
    A MIDISong is a list of MIDITrack objects.
    MIDISysExEvent
    A MIDISysExEvent extends MIDIEvent so it has, a MIDIMessage and a time stamp in tiks.
    MIDITrack
    A MIDITrack is a list of MIDIEvent objects.
    SequenceWrapper
    The wrap method of the SequenceWrapper class takes a imr.media.midi.MIDISongobject as parameter and returns a javax.sound.midi.Sequence object
    ShortMessageWrapper
    The wrap method of the ShortMessageWrapper class takes a imr.media.midi.MIDIMessageobject as parameter and returns a javax.sound.midi.ShortMessage object
    SysexMessageWrapper
    The wrap method of the SysexMessageWrapper class takes a imr.media.midi.MIDISysExEventobject as parameter and returns a javax.sound.midi.SysexMessage object

Package imr.media.midi Description

The midi package provides classes to manage MIDI data and wrappers to javax.sound.midi classes.

In addition, also implements a MIDI file reader and writer and a MIDI player.
